attributes.action: Grant the English a referendum to remove Scotland from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: (1) Scottish court to decide whether Boris Johnson can be jailed over no-deal Brexit https://www.scotsman.com/news/crime/scottish-court-to-decide-whether-boris-johnson-can-be-jailed-over-no-deal-brexit-1-5015160?fbclid=IwAR0yqdwBriZ7pfvs9a_3icDcs-tFJG8XQ9w8m9kzqYHYumofLsjYiYhDIhg
attributes.background: Those of us in England want a referendum to remove Scotland from the UK. We had no say in the Scottish independence referendum whether we wanted them in the UK.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is for the people of Scotland to decide their future.
